src_original: akṣobhyānupraveśena trimukhaṃ ṣaḍbhujojjvalam /  indranīlaprabhaṃ dīptaṃ vajrasattvaṃ vibhāvayet // Pik_52 //  vajraṃ cakraṃ tathā padmaṃ savyahasteṣu bhāvayet /  ghaṇṭāṃ ratnaṃ tathā khaṅgaṃ vāmahasteṣu bhāvayet // Pik_53 //
tato nyāsaṃ prakurvīta skandhādīnāṃ vibhāgavit /  vairocanādisumbhāntaṃ bījanyāsena tattvataḥ // Pik_54 //
